class_notes: Required for AGPCNP, PNP-AC,FENP, FNP, and WHGRNP students only.
course_description: Students transitioning to the advanced practice nurse (APRN) role will discuss professional scope, standards, competencies, collaborative practice, and ethics and legal regulations governing practice.
